name: LCD - Spinal Cord Stimulators for Chronic Pain
description: This Local Coverage Determination (LCD) outlines the coverage criteria for Spinal Cord Stimulators (SCS) as a therapy for chronic intractable pain, including trial and permanent implantation, patient selection, and program requirements. It details conditions for patient eligibility, trial success, provider qualifications, and limitations on leads, contacts, and trials.

restrictions.condition: SCS therapy is indicated for the relief of chronic intractable pain.
SCS is best suited for neuropathic pain.
SCS may have limited value in nociceptive severe, intractable pain.
Performance and documentation of an effective SCS trial is a prerequisite for permanent nerve stimulation.
A new SCS trial is not needed for stimulator replacement due to battery change.
A new SCS trial is not needed for stimulator replacement due to malfunction.
A new SCS trial is not needed for stimulator replacement due to end of stimulator life.
SCS therapy must be considered a late option after more conservative therapies have been tried.
Patient must undergo careful screening, evaluation and diagnosis by a multidisciplinary team prior to implantation.
Psychological evaluation is a required component of patient screening.
Physical evaluation is a required component of patient screening.
Patient must not have active substance abuse issues.
Patient must undergo proper education, discussion, and disclosure of risks and benefits.
Temporary neurostimulator trials should preferably be placed in an ASC or outpatient hospital setting.
Temporary neurostimulator trials can be done in an office setting if all sterility, equipment, professional training, and support personnel are available.
restrictions.rule: scs_trial_setting_office_criteria = 'all sterility, equipment, professional training, and support personnel required for the proper surgery, and follow up of the patient are available'

restrictions.condition: Permanent neurostimulators must be placed in an ASC or hospital.
Physicians performing SCS trials in the office setting must have like privileges at a local hospital or ASC.
restrictions.rule: physician_scs_trial_office_qualifications = 'privileges at a local hospital or ASC'

restrictions.condition: Physicians performing SCS trials in the office setting must be subspecialty boarded in Pain Medicine by the American Board of Anesthesiology.
restrictions.rule: physician_scs_trial_office_qualifications = 'subspecialty boarded in Pain Medicine by the American Board of Anesthesiology'

restrictions.condition: Only patients who experience a positive response to an SCS trial should proceed to permanent implantation.
A successful SCS trial should be associated with at least a 50% reduction of target pain.
A successful SCS trial should be associated with at least a 50% reduction of analgesic medications.
A successful SCS trial must show some element of functional improvement.
For patients with reflex sympathetic dystrophy, lower levels of improvement and longer trial periods may be expected.
restrictions.rule: diagnosis_reflex_sympathetic_dystrophy_scs_trial_impact = 'may show lower levels of improvement and takes longer periods for improvement'

restrictions.condition: Physicians with a trial to permanent implant ratio less than 50% will be subject to post-payment review.
Noridian will reimburse for a maximum of 2 SCS leads.
Noridian will reimburse for a maximum of 16 SCS contacts.
Noridian will reimburse for a maximum of 2 SCS trials per anatomic spinal region per patient per lifetime.
Exceptions to the maximum number of SCS trials are allowed for technical limitations for initial trials.
Exceptions to the maximum number of SCS trials are allowed for use of different modalities of stimulation, including new technology.
restrictions.rule: scs_trials_max_count_exception_criteria = 'use of different modalities of stimulation, including new technology'

restrictions.condition: A repeat SCS trial is not appropriate after initial failure unless there are extenuating circumstances.
restrictions.rule: scs_repeat_trial_allowed_criteria = 'extenuating circumstances that lead to trial failure'

restrictions.condition: Diagnosis code for encounter for adjustment and management of neurostimulator.
Diagnosis codes for specific spinal disorders.
Diagnosis codes including causalgia and complications of internal prosthetic devices affecting lower limb or trunk.
Diagnosis codes including complications of internal prosthetic devices affecting upper limb.
